idea:
Artha is an ERP solution for Film making & Event Management, our Software with Advanced solutions to bring more focus on creativity. 


Challenging convention. Trying new things. Reshaping an industry.  


The team at Artha helps Production companies bring amazing ideas to life quickly and easily with software that thinks and works as they do. We're fueled by sharing ideas openly, challenging conventions, trying new things, and valuing "Why not?" over "Why?" Our certainty that there is always a better way to do things keeps carriers ahead of their competition and is helping to reshape an industry.  


If having a hand in transforming one of the world’s oldest and largest industries into a standard for innovation, open exchange, and peerless user experience sounds exciting, let us know.
name: ARTHAWARE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Development Catalysts (DC) was envisioned as a company which acts as a catalyst assisting individuals, businesses and governments to embrace the sustainable development paradigm. DC is a management and design consultancy specialising in sustainable development practices. The qualified and highly experienced team of DC has been involved with providing strategic consulting services to businesses, government and non-government organisations at various stages, right from conceptualisation to execution and beyond. 

 Services offered include developing environmentally responsive plans & projects for rural and urban areas, sustainable building designs, conceptualisation and management of Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) projects, master-planning, infrastructure and urban planning, capacity building for implementing the sustainable development goals,  institutional integration of environmental and social governance, research and management of natural resources and  identification, monitoring and management of environment and social risks for institutions and their projects.  The services provided also include framing of policies, programme, procedures, marketing & funding strategies etc. 

 Other focus areas include promoting eco-villages and eco-urban centers, developing neighbourhood environment improvement plans, waste management research, setting up aquaponics/hydroponics projects, training and capacity building, sustainability appraisals, peer reviews, architectural design services for retail and institutional buildings.
name: Development Catalysts

idea:
Given the current situation at hand, it is our foresight that colleges and other educational institutions will start relying on collaborative services even more. Our vision was to create a homegrown app which has end to end encryption, complete user privacy, and offers everything that the students and teachers might need, in a single app. This would eliminate the need to have enterprise accounts setup in different apps, having to go through the security and privacy protocols of these various services; which can be a labor overhead for no reason. With WeGyan, we aim to solve this problem, while making everything easy to use, straightforward, accessible via both a webpage, and mobile apps.

We have created a promotional website for WeGyan which has screenshots and other information about the web app and the Android app (iOS work in progress), hosted at: www.wegyan.tech
name: WeGyan.tech

idea: We are building a community for B2B businesses where they can connect, network, see and share products and latest updates of their business. The goal is to get all 70 million small businesses in India on one platform which can help them go digital and grow their business in the way they understand best (i.e. building relationships)
